pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AMAAZE ToolsThe AMAAZETools Python package contains Python implementations of mesh processing tools developed by [AMAAZE](https://amaaze.umn.edu/). The examples directory contains a series of test scripts showing how to use the package. ## InstallationThe package is now available on the python package index, and can be installed with```pip install amaazetools```To install the most recent developers version of the package, run ```git clone https://github.com/jwcalder/AMAAZEToolscd AMAAZEToolspip install -r requirements.txtpython setup.py install --user```## DocumentationDetailed documentation for all of the Python code within this repository can be found at <https://jwcalder.github.io/AMAAZETools/>.## Contact and questionsEmail <jwcalder@umn.edu> with any questions or comments.## ContributorsSeveral people have contributed to the development of this software:1. David Floeder2. Riley O'Neill3. Brendan Cook
